dao.name: QRY_HFD_USE_DT
dao.statement: select athena_id, hotel_cod, key_nos, item_cod, item_qnt, begin_dat, end_dat, action_cod, status_cod, ins_dat, ins_usr, upd_dat, upd_usr from hfd_use_dt where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) and trim(item_cod) = trim(:item_cod)

dao.name: QRY_HFD_USE_DT_COUNT
dao.statement: select count(*) item_count from hfd_use_dt where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) and trim(item_cod) = trim(:item_cod) and action_cod <> 'add' and status_cod = 'N' and rownum <= 1
